question: Select the correct recipe for a medium blue raspberry lemonade Chiller:

answerChoices.choice1: 1 oz blue raspberry, fill to the 6 with lemon concentrate, then fill to the 12 with lemonade
answerChoices.choice2: 3 oz blue raspberry, fill to the 12 oz line with lemonade
answerChoices.choice3: 1 oz blue raspberry, fill to the 6 oz line with lemonade, then to the 12 with lemon concentrate
answerChoices.choice4: 1 oz blue raspberry, fill to the 9 with lemon concentrate, then fill to the 12 with lemonade

question: Select the correct recipe for a large lemonade Chiller:

answerChoices.choice2: 12 oz lemonade concentrate, 4 oz of lemonade
answerChoices.choice3: 8 oz lemonade concentrate, 8 oz of lemonade
answerChoices.choice4: 6 oz lemonade concentrate, 6 oz of lemonade

question: This is the correct recipe for a large cherry lemon freeze: 2 scoops of cherry, fill to the 8 with lemon concentrate, fill tro the 16 with ice cream mix, full cup of ice.
